relation: Type the new master password once more.

For Windows only: if you select this check box, the master password itself will be stored encrypted in the password database. (Your Windows logon credentials will be used for encryption.) As a result, PhpStorm won't ask you for the master password when accessing the password database.
If you don't remember the current master password, click this button to reset it. (The Reset Master Password dialog will open.)
pageTitle: PhpStorm 9.0.0 Help :: Change Master Password Dialog
textBeforeTable: If you don't remember the current password, you can reset the master password (click Reset). You can set the new password empty. As a result, PhpStorm won't ask you for the password when accessing the password database. However, the security of your passwords in that case will be lower. Specify your current master password, and then a new master password. ( The master password is used to access the PhpStorm password database where - if so specified - your passwords are stored. ) If your master password is already set, you can open this dialog by clicking Master Password on the Passwords page.
